To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private HeikinAshi _heikinashi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_heikinashi = HeikinAshi(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_heikinashi.IsReady)
{
    var open = _heikinashi.Open.Value;
    var high = _heikinashi.High.Value;
    var low = _heikinashi.Low.Value;
    var close = _heikinashi.Close.Value;
    var volume = _heikinashi.Volume.Value;
    var current = _heikinashi.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.heikinashi = self.HeikinAshi(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.heikinashi.IsReady:
    open = self.heikinashi.Open.Value
    high = self.heikinashi.High.Value
    low = self.heikinashi.Low.Value
    close = self.heikinashi.Close.Value
    volume = self.heikinashi.Volume.Value
    current = self.heikinashi.Current.Value
